title: News24.com | ANALYSIS: How the state will take control of our lives, and why it must be kept in check
description: South Africans, Covid-19 or not, cannot simply and blithely forfeit their freedoms and liberties to the state without questioning every detail of how and what the state is going to do with it, writes Pieter du Toit.
